rules_text: When Writhing Abomination enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a decayed counter on it. [i](It can’t block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
notes:
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
